description: This file defines inline testing utility functions for assertions in the L0Test namespace, including ExpectTrue, ExpectEqU32, ExpectEqStr, and ExpectJsonEq, intended to be used in unit tests to verify conditions and compare values.

methods.name: void ExpectTrue(TestResult & tr,const bool condition,const std::string & what)
methods.description: Checks if a condition is true; logs failure if not.

methods.name: void ExpectEqU32(TestResult & tr,const uint32_t actual,const uint32_t expected,const std::string & what)
methods.description: Checks if two uint32_t values are equal; logs failure if not.

methods.name: void ExpectEqStr(TestResult & tr,const std::string & actual,const std::string & expected,const std::string & what)
methods.description: Checks if two strings are equal; logs failure if not.

methods.name: void ExpectJsonEq(TestResult & tr,const std::string & actualJson,const std::string & expectedJson,const std::string & what)
methods.description: Checks if two JSON strings are equal as raw text; logs failure if not.

ctags.name: ExpectEqStr
ctags.pattern: /^inline void ExpectEqStr(TestResult& tr, const std::string& actual, const std::string& expected, /
ctags.signature: (TestResult & tr,const std::string & actual,const std::string & expected,const std::string & what)

ctags.name: ExpectEqU32
ctags.pattern: /^inline void ExpectEqU32(TestResult& tr, const uint32_t actual, const uint32_t expected, const st/
ctags.signature: (TestResult & tr,const uint32_t actual,const uint32_t expected,const std::string & what)

ctags.name: ExpectJsonEq
ctags.pattern: /^inline void ExpectJsonEq(TestResult& tr, const std::string& actualJson, const std::string& expec/
ctags.signature: (TestResult & tr,const std::string & actualJson,const std::string & expectedJson,const std::string & what)

ctags.name: ExpectTrue
ctags.pattern: /^inline void ExpectTrue(TestResult& tr, const bool condition, const std::string& what)$/
